org.forgerock.openidm.metadata.impl

Interface ProviderListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DelayedConfigHandler

    public interface ProviderListener
    Listener to handle Provider registrations

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addedProvider(Object originId, MetaDataProvider service)
      Notified when a provider was added
      void init(ConfigCrypto configCrypto)
      Initialize the listener to make it ready to handle listener events

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(ConfigCrypto configCrypto)
        Initialize the listener to make it ready to handle listener events
        Parameters:
        configCrypto - The configuration cryptography facility holding the meta-data about encrypted properties

      • addedProvider

        void addedProvider(Object originId,
                   MetaDataProvider service)
        Notified when a provider was added
        Parameters:
        originId - an identifier indicating where the meta data provider is coming from
        service - the added provider
